'''''Úmaiar''''' (or ''Umaiar'') is a [[Quenya]] word referring to the [[evil spirits]] corrupted by [[Morgoth]]. The chief among them were the [[Balrogs]].<ref name=MR>{{HM|MR}}, pp. 79 (commentary to §30), 165 (commentary to §18)</ref>
==Etymology==
*''[[ú-]]'' + ''[[maiar]]''<ref name=MR/>

==See also==
*[[Maiar]]
*[[Demons]]
